page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE IN READING
page.content:
On Sunday I go to church in the morning at 9.30.I have my breakfast and get dressed.On my way back,I get my sweets or sometimes my brother takes me there.There is a shop down the road.When it rains I invite my friends to play but when it is sunny my brothers and I play outside.In the winter all my family go down to the river on our sledge.In summer we sometimes go to the seaside but one day we went when it was raining and so we went in the arcade all day.Later it got nicer so we went to the shop to buy some rock.We went swimming in the pool which was good because there were lots of steps and it was warm.Then we had to go home and I ate my rock.
Catherine Coll 9 yrs English Martyrs Primary.
